comments.html: I'm not familiar with Cisco's multihop FCoE. What products/code are you referring to Ivan?
comments.name: Patrick Swackhammer

comments.html:
It's a well-hidden mystery, took me more than half an hour to figure it out:

Nexus 5000 with NX-OS 5.0(2)N2(1) (VE_ports)

http://www.cisco.com/en/US/docs/switches/datacenter/nexus5000/sw/release/notes/Rel_5_0_2_N1_1/Nexus5000_Release_Notes_5_0_2_N1_1.html#wp240540

Nexus 7000 with NX-OS 5.2 (future)
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
